text: Hello! I have something really important that I would like to talk to you about today.
HI! OK, I'm curious to hear what you have to say.
Great! Have you ever heard of the Save the Children Foundation?
Not sure. Sounds familiar.

Well, it is an international non-governmental organization that promotes the rights of children in war torn areas. It provides relief and helps support the children in these developing countries. Does this sound like something you could be passionate about?
Yes, it does.
It is a great organization because they use donations really well. They are able to tangibly help these kiddos. They have a huge interntional impact. What do you think about that?
Sounds good so far.
Do you have any questions about the organization?
How long has it been around?
It was founded in 1919! So its almost had a century of impact.
Who is behind it?
The people who run it are non-for profit and do it full time! You know what is really awesome though?
What is really awesome?
We can help! This program that we are doing right now on MTURK allows us to donate some of our earnings to Save the Children. It is such a simple and easy way to make an impact if one wanted to.
What percent of donations go to staff, administrative costs, etc.?
9 of every 10 dollars goes directly to children in need! So only 10% to administrative costs. The other thing is that we can help a child by donating the cost of a candy bar!
How is the money distributed? Who precisely is performing the relief help?

Volunteers provide the relief work through a variety of programs and emergency aid. The money is distributed where it is needed most - so if there is an emergency more money will go there. But there is a question that I would like to ask you.
Go ahead, ask.
Would you be willing to donate $0.20 to the relief work if I match the donation from this Mturk task? Together we can make a difference!
Yes, that would be OK.
Awesome! You are the best!
